content: **what you ll need** 5 00mm crochet hook aran yarn 10ply - *i used patons merino extrafine aran canary cherry black * tapestry/wool needle 2x buttons 3/4 in size **size available** newborn 0 - 3 months old head circumference 13 5 inches 34cm hat height 5 5 inches 14cm 3 - 6 months old head circumference 15 inches 38cm hat height 6 inches 15cm **gauge** 7 stitches & 6 row in half_double_crochet = 2 inches **stitches & abbreviations** st s stitch es chain chain stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet hdc2tog - half_double_crochet 2 together/decrease slip_stitch - slip_stitch
